products.name: Moisturizing Cream
products.description: A rich moisturizer that helps restore the skin barrier and provide long-lasting hydration.
products.allIngredients: Aqua / Water, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Cholesterol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phytosphingosine, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol

products.name: PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion
products.description: A lightweight nighttime moisturizer that hydrates and supports skin barrier repair.
products.allIngredients: Aqua / Water, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol

products.name: Hydro Boost Water Gel
products.description: A lightweight gel moisturizer that delivers intense hydration without heaviness.
products.allIngredients: Water, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin

products.name: Toleriane Sensitive Fluide
products.description: A lightweight moisturizer formulated to soothe and hydrate sensitive skin.
products.allIngredients: Aqua / Water, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Hydroxide

products.name: Lipikar Balm AP+M
products.description: A nourishing balm that relieves dryness and helps rebalance the skin barrier.
products.allIngredients: Aqua / Water, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Niacinamide, Mineral Oil, Dimethicone

products.name: Dramatically Different Hydrating Jelly
products.description: An oil-free gel moisturizer that delivers hydration without clogging pores.
products.allIngredients: Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cucumis Sativus Fruit Extract, Phenoxyethanol

products.name: Ultra Facial Cream
products.description: A lightweight cream that provides long-lasting hydration for daily use.
products.allIngredients: Aqua / Water, Glycerin, Squalane, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Phenoxyethanol

products.name: Ultra Repair Cream
products.description: A rich cream designed to soothe and hydrate very dry or irritated skin.
products.allIngredients: Water, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Colloidal Oatmeal, Allantoin, Phenoxyethanol
